00029 #ifndef SC_MUTEX_IF_H
00030 #define SC_MUTEX_IF_H
00031 
00032 #include "sysc/communication/sc_interface.h"
00033 
00034 namespace sc_core {
00035 
00036 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 //  CLASS : sc_mutex_if
00038 //
00039 //  The sc_mutex_if interface class.
00040 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 class SC_API sc_mutex_if
00043 : virtual public sc_interface
00044 {
00045 public:
00046 
00047     // the classical operations: lock(), trylock(), and unlock()
00048 
00049     // blocks until mutex could be locked
00050     virtual int lock() = 0;
00051 
00052     // returns -1 if mutex could not be locked
00053     virtual int trylock() = 0;
00054 
00055     // returns -1 if mutex was not locked by caller
00056     virtual int unlock() = 0;
00057 
00058 protected:
00059 
00060     // constructor
00061 
00062     sc_mutex_if()
00063         {}
00064 
00065 private:
00066 
00067     // disabled
00068     sc_mutex_if( const sc_mutex_if& );
00069     sc_mutex_if& operator = ( const sc_mutex_if& );
00070 };
00071 
00072 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 //  CLASS : sc_scoped_lock
00074 //
00075 //  The sc_scoped_lock class to lock (and automatically release) a mutex.
00076 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 //template< typename Lockable = sc_mutex_if >
00079 class SC_API sc_scoped_lock
00080 {
00081 public:
00082     //typedef Lockable lockable_type;
00083     typedef sc_mutex_if lockable_type;
00084 
00085     explicit
00086     sc_scoped_lock( lockable_type& mtx )
00087       : m_ref(mtx)
00088       , m_active(true)
00089     {
00090         m_ref.lock();
00091     }
00092 
00093     bool release()
00094     {
00095         if( m_active )
00096         {
00097             m_ref.unlock();
00098             m_active = false;
00099             return true;
00100         }
00101         return false;
00102     }
00103 
00104     ~sc_scoped_lock()
00105     {
00106         release();
00107     }
00108 
00109 private:
00110     // disabled
00111     sc_scoped_lock( const sc_scoped_lock& );
00112     sc_scoped_lock& operator=( const sc_scoped_lock& );
00113 
00114     lockable_type& m_ref;
00115     bool           m_active;
00116 };
